DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of omalizumab up to 16 weeks in adult patients with moderate to severe bronchial asthma.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Omalizumab in Moderate to Severe Bronchial Asthma
DOC.criteria: Allergic asthma patients Inadequately controlled patients History of severe anaphylactoid or anaphylactic reactions Previous treatment with omalizumab History of cancer or cancer Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
